column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. TARGET NEUTRALIZED, I REPEAT TARGET NEUTRALIZED. OVER.
ALPHA TO BRAVO. READY FOR EXTRACTION. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. LANDING ZONE IN SIGHT GET READY. OVER.
ALPHA BLACK THIS IS BRAVO. GET READY FOR EXTRACTION. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. ROGER THAT. GET TO THE EXTRACT SITE. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. WELCOME HOME. MISSION ACCOMPLISHED. OVER.
